name: Ferrari Grand Prix Challenge
overview: Strap yourself into the most famous and powerful formula racing machine for realistic Grand Prix action! Speed flat out 335 km/h straights. Control...split-second hairpin cornering. Challenge.. you against 25 competitors. Choose your transmission: automatic or manual. Then shift into high gear as you race your way to the Grand Prix World Championship 16 international tracks, record-breaking speeds, interactive pit stops and precision maneuvering FERRARI GRAND PRIX CHALLENGE ..The ultimate in formula racing!
